InstalledItem.Name: FR-66
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Military

The FR-66 is one of the most versatile small shield generator currently on the market. Get military strength protection and performance from Gorgon Defender Industries to ensure your ship can survive any onslaught.

InstalledItem.Name: NDB-28 Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: MaxOx
Item Type: Neutron Repeater
Size: 2

Featuring a sleek, scientific design, the MaxOx NDB-28 is the next step in serious stopping power. Twin barrels overlap blasts for sustained neutron fire that remains effective at short to medium range.

InstalledItem.Name: SW16BR1 “Buzzsaw” Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Ballistic Repeater
Size: 1

Firing from two barrels, the SW16BR1 "Buzzsaw" can overwhelm aggressors at medium to close range. Behring's expert craftsmanship allows the weapon to engage in sustained firefights before needing a cooldown, making it an excellent entry level ballistic repeater.

InstalledItem.Name: Rush
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: ArcCorp 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Rush is a popular commercial quantum drive that lives up to its name.

InstalledItem.Name: Capston
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Experience why WillsOp is a premiere manufacturer of ship electronics with their Capston radar. Outfit your ship with one today so you know what’s nearby.

InstalledItem.Name: Glacier
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Military

Your weapons, your shields, your thrusters. All vital during combat, all generating heat. Enter the Glacier cooler from Aegis Dynamics. A best-in-class heat management system designed to keep you cool as the pressure mounts.

InstalledItem.Name: Glacier
InstalledItem.Description:

InstalledItem.Name: TroMag Burst Generator
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: MaxOx
Item Type: Burst Generator
Size: 1
Damage Type: EMP

The TroMag from MaxOx is a well-designed and reliable EMP-focused burst generator. Its popularity has risen over the years as pilots look for alternatives to Behring’s REP-8. The TroMag boasts a faster charge time than their main competitor but has a smaller effective radius, leaving pilots to decide whether they prefer speed or size.

InstalledItem.Name: QuadraCell
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Military

Few military-grade power plants get better than the Aegis QuadraCell. It wasn’t just built to survive the heat of battle, it was built to thrive in it.
